(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^shrinkwrap\.yaml$
^tests/lib/transforms/HashTransform\.js$
^tests/resources/configs/base64-decode-with-data/secret\.7z$
^tests/resources/configs/base64-decode/secret$
^tests/resources/configs/base64-encode/result\.json$
^tests/resources/configs/file-content/pushcorn\.com\.crt$
^tests/resources/configs/file-content/pushcorn\.com\.csr$
^tests/resources/configs/file-content/pushcorn\.com\.key$
^tests/resources/configs/file-content/pushcorn\.com\.pem$
^tests/resources/configs/file-content/result\.json$
^tests/resources/configs/includes-2/subdir/baz\.conf$
^tests/resources/configs/includes/letters/numbers/2\.properties$
^tests/resources/configs/sort-transform-with-expr-desc\.default/result\.json$
^tests/resources/configs/sort-transform-with-expr\.default/result\.json$
^tests/resources/configs/sort-transform-with-expr\.default/test\.conf$
^tests/resources/configs/sort-transform-with-property\.default/result\.json$

^tests/resources/json-tests/
